languages.text: "Утверждение истинно". {n}Паскаль простирает длань к машине, и ту окутывают снопы искр. Трещина на бронированном респираторе техножреца сверкает зеленым блеском. Голос его облекается сталью:{/n} "Моя мощь — залог моих полномочий. Признай их или пожалеешь, ретивый дух!"

"This statement is true." {n}Pasqal extends a hand toward the machine, which is enveloped in showers of sparks. The crack in the Tech-Priest's armoured respirator shines a bright green. There is steel in his voice:{/n} "My power is my authorisation. Acknowledge it or you will regret it, wayward spirit!"
languages.original_text: "Утверждение истинно". {n}Паскаль простирает длань к машине, и ту окутывают снопы искр. Трещина на бронированном респираторе техножреца сверкает зеленым блеском. Голос его облекается сталью:{/n} "Моя мощь — залог моих полномочий. Признай их или пожалеешь, ретивый дух!"

traits.locale_text: "This statement is true." {n}Pasqal extends a hand toward the machine, which is enveloped in showers of sparks. The crack in the Tech-Priest's armoured respirator shines a bright green. There's steel in his voice.{/n} "My power creates my authorisation. Acknowledge it or you will regret it, wayward spirit!"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This statement is true." {n}Pasqal extends a hand toward the machine, which is enveloped in showers of sparks. The crack in the Tech-Priest's armoured respirator shines a bright green. There is steel in his voice:{/n} "My power is my authorisation. Acknowledge it or you will regret it, wayward spirit!"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「その発言は正しい」{n}パスカルは機械へと手を伸ばし、火花の雨で包み込む。技術司祭の呼吸器に入ったひびが明るい緑色に光る。パスカルの声は無情だ。{/n}「自分の力が権限の証明だ。認めなくば後悔するぞ、勝手をする精霊め！」
languages.original_text: "This statement is true." {n}Pasqal extends a hand toward the machine, which is enveloped in showers of sparks. The crack in the Tech-Priest's armoured respirator shines a bright green. There is steel in his voice:{/n} "My power is my authorisation. Acknowledge it or you will regret it, wayward spirit!"

traits.locale_text: 「その発言は正しい」{n}パスカルは機械へと手を伸ばし、火花の雨で包み込む。技術司祭の呼吸器に入ったひびが明るい緑色に光る。パスカルの声は無情だ。{/n}「自分の力が権限の証明だ。認めなくば後悔するぞ、勝手をする精霊め！」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “这种说法是正确的。”{n}帕斯卡向机器伸出一只手，一阵火花随之包围住了机器，他吸器上的裂缝中发出亮绿色的光芒。他强硬地说道。{/n}“我的力量就是我的授权。承认它，不然你会后悔的，任性的机魂！”
languages.original_text: "This statement is true." {n}Pasqal extends a hand toward the machine, which is enveloped in showers of sparks. The crack in the Tech-Priest's armoured respirator shines a bright green. There is steel in his voice:{/n} "My power is my authorisation. Acknowledge it or you will regret it, wayward spirit!"

traits.locale_text: “这种说法是正确的。”{n}帕斯卡向机器伸出一只手，一阵火花随之包围住了机器，他吸器上的裂缝中发出亮绿色的光芒。他强硬地说道。{/n}“我的力量就是我的授权。承认它，不然你会后悔的，任性的机魂！”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Cette affirmation est exacte. » {n}Pasqal tend la main vers la machine enveloppée d'étincelles tandis que la fente de son respirateur se teinte d'un vert étincelant.{/n} « Mon pouvoir est mon autorisation, » {n}déclare-t-il d'une voix dure comme le métal.{/n} « Reconnaissez-le ou vous le regretterez, esprit rebelle ! »
languages.original_text: "This statement is true." {n}Pasqal extends a hand toward the machine, which is enveloped in showers of sparks. The crack in the Tech-Priest's armoured respirator shines a bright green. There is steel in his voice:{/n} "My power is my authorisation. Acknowledge it or you will regret it, wayward spirit!"

traits.locale_text: « Cette affirmation est exacte. » {n}Pasqal tend la main vers la machine enveloppée d'étincelles tandis que la fente de son respirateur se teinte d'un vert étincelant.{/n} « Mon pouvoir est mon autorisation, » {n}déclare-t-il d'une voix dure comme le métal.{/n} « Reconnaissez-le ou vous le regretterez, esprit rebelle ! »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Esta declaración es verdadera». {n}Pasqal extiende una mano hacia la máquina, de la que salen cientos de chispas. La grieta del respirador blindado del tecnosacerdote brilla con una intensa luz verde. Su voz expresa determinación.{/n} «Que mi poder sirva como autorización. ¡Reconózcalo o se arrepentirá, espíritu obstinado!».
languages.original_text: "This statement is true." {n}Pasqal extends a hand toward the machine, which is enveloped in showers of sparks. The crack in the Tech-Priest's armoured respirator shines a bright green. There is steel in his voice:{/n} "My power is my authorisation. Acknowledge it or you will regret it, wayward spirit!"

traits.locale_text: «Esta declaración es verdadera». {n}Pasqal extiende una mano hacia la máquina, de la que salen cientos de chispas. La grieta del respirador blindado del tecnosacerdote brilla con una intensa luz verde. Su voz expresa determinación.{/n} «Que mi poder sirva como autorización. ¡Reconózcalo o se arrepentirá, espíritu obstinado!».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt." {n}Pasqal streckt eine Hand zu der Maschine aus, die sofort in einen Funkenschauer gehüllt wird. Der Riss im gepanzerten Respirator des Techpriesters leuchtet hellgrün auf. In seiner Stimme liegt Stahl.{/n} "Meine Macht ist meine Autorisierung. Akzeptiert sie, oder Ihr werdet es bereuen, abtrünniger Geist!"
languages.original_text: "This statement is true." {n}Pasqal extends a hand toward the machine, which is enveloped in showers of sparks. The crack in the Tech-Priest's armoured respirator shines a bright green. There is steel in his voice:{/n} "My power is my authorisation. Acknowledge it or you will regret it, wayward spirit!"

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt." {n}Pasqal streckt eine Hand zu der Maschine aus, die sofort in einen Funkenschauer gehüllt wird. Der Riss im gepanzerten Respirator des Techpriesters leuchtet hellgrün auf. In seiner Stimme liegt Stahl.{/n} "Meine Macht ist meine Autorisierung. Akzeptiert sie, oder Ihr werdet es bereuen, abtrünniger Geist!"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Bu önerme doğru." {n}Pasqal bir elini, her yerinden kıvılcımlar çıkan makineye uzatıyor. Tekno Rahip'in zırhlı solunum maskesindeki çatlak, parlak yeşil renkte yanıyor. Sesi çelik gibi çıkıyor.{/n} "Gücüm yetkimdir. Asi ruh, ya bunu kabul edersin ya da pişman olursun!"
languages.original_text: "This statement is true." {n}Pasqal extends a hand toward the machine, which is enveloped in showers of sparks. The crack in the Tech-Priest's armoured respirator shines a bright green. There is steel in his voice:{/n} "My power is my authorisation. Acknowledge it or you will regret it, wayward spirit!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu önerme doğru." {n}Pasqal bir elini, her yerinden kıvılcımlar çıkan makineye doğru uzatıyor. Tekno Rahip'in zırhlı solunum maskesindeki çatlak, parlak yeşil renkte yanıyor. Sesi çelik gibi:{/n} "Gücüm yetkimdir. Asi ruh, onu kabul et ya da pişman ol!"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
